channel.title: Max Long's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Max Long's Blog

item.title: My First Post
item.author: your@email.com (Max Long)
item.description:
This is the content of my first post. The hugo-simple theme provides a clean, readable design perfect for text-focused content.

Features

  • Clean typography
  • Dark mode support
  • Fast loading (no JavaScript)
  • SEO friendly

Write naturally in Markdown and the theme handles the rest.
item.content:encoded:
This is the content of my first post. The hugo-simple theme provides a clean, readable design perfect for text-focused content.

Features

  • Clean typography
  • Dark mode support
  • Fast loading (no JavaScript)
  • SEO friendly

Write naturally in Markdown and the theme handles the rest.

item.author: your@email.com (Max Long)
item.description: This weekend we celebrated the career of Prof. Peter Mandler with a book launch and a conference featuring contributions from friends and colleagues across his career. The book, entitled Democratising History: Modern British History Inside and Out, is edited by Freddy Foks, Laura Carter, and Philip Harling. The introduction, by Laura and Freddy, is a particularly rich contribution to the field, outlining a rough genealogy for the concept of ‘democratisation’, which has so far received surprisingly little detailed attention by historians of Britain. The book is available to download for free now!
item.content:encoded: This weekend we celebrated the career of Prof. Peter Mandler with a book launch and a conference featuring contributions from friends and colleagues across his career. The book, entitled Democratising History: Modern British History Inside and Out, is edited by Freddy Foks, Laura Carter, and Philip Harling. The introduction, by Laura and Freddy, is a particularly rich contribution to the field, outlining a rough genealogy for the concept of ‘democratisation’, which has so far received surprisingly little detailed attention by historians of Britain. The book is available to download for free now!
